languages.text: {n}От удивления Кассия склоняет голову набок.{/n} "Вы и правда этого желаете? Но я... дилетант, не более. Простите, Лорд-капитан, не думаю, что это хорошая идея. Эти покои нуждаются в произведении мастера, а я... я просто рисую для души". {n}Девушка учтиво отказывается, но едва заметная улыбка в уголках ее губ говорит громче слов.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}От удивления Кассия склоняет голову набок.{/n} "Вы и правда этого желаете? Но я... дилетант, не более. Простите, Лорд-капитан, не думаю, что это хорошая идея. Эти покои нуждаются в произведении мастера, а я... я просто рисую для души". {n}Девушка учтиво отказывается, но едва заметная улыбка в уголках ее губ говорит громче слов.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cassia cocks her head in surprise.{/n} "Do you truly wish that it would? But... I must admit, I am nothing more than an amateur. You will have to forgive me, Lord Captain, but I do not think that it is such a good idea. These chambers are in need of masterpieces, while I... I paint merely for my own pleasure." {n}Her furtive smile speaks louder than her polite refusal.{/n}

I paint merely for my own pleasure." {n}Her furtive smile speaks louder than her polite refusal.{/n}

languages.text: {n}卡西娅惊讶地抬起头。{/n}“你真的打算挂上我的画作吗？可是……我必须得承认，我的技艺非常生疏。舰长大人，请你原谅，可我认为这实在不是个好主意。你的房间应该挂上艺术大师的旷世杰作，我的那些画……只是兴致使然的胡乱涂鸦罢了。”{n}尽管卡西娅似乎在礼貌客套地拒绝你，但她脸上若隐若现的笑意却流露出了她愉悦的心情。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia cocks her head in surprise.{/n} "Do you truly wish that it would? But... I must admit, I am nothing more than an amateur. You will have to forgive me, Lord Captain, but I do not think that it is such a good idea. These chambers are in need of masterpieces, while I... I paint merely for my own pleasure." {n}Her furtive smile speaks louder than her polite refusal.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}卡西娅惊讶地抬起头。{/n}“你真的打算挂上我的画作吗？可是……我必须得承认，我的技艺非常生疏。舰长大人，请你原谅，可我认为这实在不是个好主意。你的房间应该挂上艺术大师的旷世杰作，我的那些画……只是兴致使然的胡乱涂鸦罢了。”{n}尽管卡西娅似乎在礼貌客套地拒绝你，但她脸上若隐若现的笑意却流露出了她愉悦的心情。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cassia legt überrascht den Kopf zur Seite.{/n} "Ist das wirklich Euer Wunsch? Aber ... Ich muss gestehen, ich bin eine Laiin. Ihr müsst mir verzeihen, Lord Captain, doch ich halte das für keine gute Idee. Diese Gemächer fordern echte Meisterwerke, während ich ... Ich male lediglich zu meinem eigenen Vergnügen." {n}Ihr verstohlenes Lächeln sagt mehr als ihre höfliche Ablehnung.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia cocks her head in surprise.{/n} "Do you truly wish that it would? But... I must admit, I am nothing more than an amateur. You will have to forgive me, Lord Captain, but I do not think that it is such a good idea. These chambers are in need of masterpieces, while I... I paint merely for my own pleasure." {n}Her furtive smile speaks louder than her polite refusal.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia legt überrascht den Kopf zur Seite.{/n} "Ist das wirklich Euer Wunsch? Aber ... Ich muss gestehen, ich bin eine Laiin. Ihr müsst mir verzeihen, Lord Captain, doch ich halte das für keine gute Idee. Diese Gemächer fordern echte Meisterwerke, während ich ... Ich male lediglich zu meinem eigenen Vergnügen." {n}Ihr verstohlenes Lächeln sagt mehr als ihre höfliche Ablehnung.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cassia incline la tête de surprise.{/n} « Vous parlez sérieusement ? Mais... je dois avouer que je ne suis guère qu'une amatrice. Pardonnez-moi, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, mais je doute que ce soit une très bonne idée. Cette pièce a besoin de chefs-d'œuvre, alors que moi... je peins uniquement pour mon propre plaisir. » {n}Son sourire furtif en dit plus long que son refus poli.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia cocks her head in surprise.{/n} "Do you truly wish that it would? But... I must admit, I am nothing more than an amateur. You will have to forgive me, Lord Captain, but I do not think that it is such a good idea. These chambers are in need of masterpieces, while I... I paint merely for my own pleasure." {n}Her furtive smile speaks louder than her polite refusal.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia incline la tête de surprise.{/n} « Vous parlez sérieusement ? Mais... je dois avouer que je ne suis guère qu'une amatrice. Pardonnez-moi, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, mais je doute que ce soit une très bonne idée. Cette pièce a besoin de chefs-d'œuvre, alors que moi... je peins uniquement pour mon propre plaisir. » {n}Son sourire furtif en dit plus long que son refus poli.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cassia ladea la cabeza, sorprendida.{/n} «¿Lo dice en serio? Pero... debo admitir que soy una simple aficionada. Tendrá que perdonarme, Lord Capitán, pero no creo que sea buena idea. Estos aposentos necesitan obras maestras y yo... solo pinto por placer». {n}Su sonrisa furtiva dice más que su cortés negativa.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia cocks her head in surprise.{/n} "Do you truly wish that it would? But... I must admit, I am nothing more than an amateur. You will have to forgive me, Lord Captain, but I do not think that it is such a good idea. These chambers are in need of masterpieces, while I... I paint merely for my own pleasure." {n}Her furtive smile speaks louder than her polite refusal.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia ladea la cabeza, sorprendida.{/n} «¿Lo dice en serio? Pero... debo admitir que soy una simple aficionada. Tendrá que perdonarme, Lord Capitán, pero no creo que sea buena idea. Estos aposentos necesitan obras maestras y yo... solo pinto por placer». {n}Su sonrisa furtiva dice más que su cortés negativa.{/n}

languages.text: {n}カシアは驚いて首をかしげる。{/n}「{name}様は本当に、そのようなことを望んでいるのですか？ですが…あたくしは、初心者でしかないことをお伝えしなければなりません。どうかお許しください、ロード・キャプテン、あたくしにはそれが良い考えだとは思えないのです。ここの部屋には傑作が必要で、でもあたくしは…自分が楽しむために描いているだけなんです」{n}彼女のひそかな微笑みは、礼儀正しい拒絶の言葉よりも多くを語っている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia cocks her head in surprise.{/n} "Do you truly wish that it would? But... I must admit, I am nothing more than an amateur. You will have to forgive me, Lord Captain, but I do not think that it is such a good idea. These chambers are in need of masterpieces, while I... I paint merely for my own pleasure." {n}Her furtive smile speaks louder than her polite refusal.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}カシアは驚いて首をかしげる。{/n}「{name}様は本当に、そのようなことを望んでいるのですか？ですが…あたくしは、初心者でしかないことをお伝えしなければなりません。どうかお許しください、ロード・キャプテン、あたくしにはそれが良い考えだとは思えないのです。ここの部屋には傑作が必要で、でもあたくしは…自分が楽しむために描いているだけなんです」{n}彼女のひそかな微笑みは、礼儀正しい拒絶の言葉よりも多くを語っている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cassia, şaşkınlıkla başını kaldırıyor.{/n} "Gerçekten ister miydin bunu? Ancak... İtiraf etmeliyim ki daha önce kendimden başka kimse için resim yapmadım. Bağışlamanı rica edeceğim Lord Kaptan ama bence bu, çok da iyi bir fikir değil. Bu odalara ancak şaheserler yakışır. Bense... Sırf kendi resim yapıyorum." {n}Kibarca reddetse de attığı kaçamak gülüşle kendini ele veriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia cocks her head in surprise.{/n} "Do you truly wish that it would? But... I must admit, I am nothing more than an amateur. You will have to forgive me, Lord Captain, but I do not think that it is such a good idea. These chambers are in need of masterpieces, while I... I paint merely for my own pleasure." {n}Her furtive smile speaks louder than her polite refusal.{/n}
